# 题目

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)

penguins <- penguins %>% drop_na()
```


- 写出`stat_***()`版本
```{r}
ggplot(penguins, aes(x = species)) +
  geom_bar()

ggplot(penguins, aes(x = species)) +
  stat_count()
```


- 想想为什么图形都是一样的
```{r}
# count(penguins, species)

penguins %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = species)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "count")


penguins %>% 
  count(species) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = species, y = n)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")


penguins %>% 
  count(species) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = species, y = n)) +
  geom_col()
```



- 比较下列图形的区别
```{r}
penguins %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = species)) +
  geom_bar(aes(x = stat(count)))


penguins %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = species)) +
  geom_bar(aes(x = stat(count) / sum(stat(count)))) +
  scale_x_continuous(labels = scales::percent)


penguins %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = species)) +
  geom_bar(aes(x = stat(count) / sum(count))) +
  scale_x_continuous(labels = scales::percent)
```



- 写出下图的`geom_***()`版本和`stat_***()`
```{r}
ggplot() +
  layer(
      data       = penguins,
      mapping    = aes(x = species, y = bill_length_mm, color = fct_rev(sex)),
      stat       = "summary", 
      params     = list(fun = "mean"),
      geom       = "point",
      position   = position_dodge(width = 0.5)
  )

```


```{r}
penguins %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = species, y = bill_length_mm, color = fct_rev(sex))) +
  stat_summary(
    geom       = "point",
    fun        = mean,
    position   = position_dodge(width = 0.5)
  )


penguins %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = species, y = bill_length_mm, color = fct_rev(sex))) +
  geom_point(
    stat       = "summary",
    fun        = mean,
    position   = position_dodge(width = 0.5)
  )
```
